backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, and CRUD stores for study materials, test series, previous papers, and daily pollution entries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding daily pollution store and related counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new pollution-related frontend features to impacted files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and core theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for landing and admin pages and wraps app with React Query provider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and role, showing appropriate UI for loading, errors, or denial.
frontend/src/components/CurrentAffairsSe: React component rendering multilingual, timeframe-filtered current affairs using tabs, selectors, and card layout.
frontend/src/components/DailyPollutionSe: Shows daily pollution data with day selector, loading/error states, and cards for pollution entries.
frontend/src/components/DailyTestSeriesS: Displays daily test series with day filtering, handling loading/errors, and showing test cards with resource links.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PreviousYearPape: Renders categorized static lists of prelims and mains previous year papers with card layouts.
frontend/src/components/ShareThisApp.tsx: Offers a shareable link UI allowing users to copy the current URL with feedback.
frontend/src/components/StudyMaterialSec: Fetches and filters study materials or previous papers by exam and language, displaying items or textbook fallbacks.
frontend/src/data/currentAffairsSample.t: Defines types and sample multilingual current affairs data organized by timeframe and language.
frontend/src/data/studyMaterialSample.ts: Provides type definitions for exam categories and languages; actual data is now backend-driven.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, logout, and identity state handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, study materials, previous papers, and test series.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app's visual palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContentManagerPa: Admin UI for managing study materials, papers, test series, and pollution entries with form state and related queries/mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section, header, and navigation to admin and previous-year papers, integrating various study-related sections.
frontend/src/utils/dayKey.ts: Utility functions to convert between dates and numeric day keys, including formatting and generating recent day ranges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the appâ€™s current requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the upscQueen project.
